docs.text: screen story by kevin yagher and andrew kevin walker .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: screenplay by andrew kevin walker .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: inspired by the short story the legend of sleepy hollow by washington irving .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: directed by tim burton .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: starring johnny depp , christina ricci , and casper van dien .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: special appearances by christopher lee and christopher walken .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: synopsis : investigator ichabod crane journeys to 1799 sleepy hollow to investigate a series of murders involving decapitation .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: townspeople believe the spirit of a dead german mercenary is threatening them .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: cute blonde katrina and a listless orphan help crane solve the mystery .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: comments : tim burton has directed a number of entertaining and groundbreaking films over the years .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: batman , of course , is perhaps his best-known film and led to a string of less successful sequels .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he's done biographical work ( on the director ed wood ) , children's movies ( nightmare before christmas ) , and a homage to alien invasion movies ( mars attacks ! ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: sleepy hollow , his newest feature which fans have been anticipating for a while , shares the similar dark and atmospheric style of his earlier work and counts among his better movies .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: sleepy hollow quite obviously draws its inspiration from the old period horror films of the 1950s and 1960s , especially hammer studios' reworkings of dracula and frankenstein , and american international's series of movies based on the works of edgar allan poe .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: christopher lee , in fact , star of many hammer productions over the years , appears at the beginning of sleepy hollow as a judge who sends ichabod crane out to investigate the murders .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the movie also borrows from the universal monster movies of the 1930s .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: one of the climatic scenes involves a windmill and obviously takes its cue from frankenstein .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i mention these allusions for a reason .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: seasoned horror film fans , including myself , will smile at their inclusion in this film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with the recent disappointments in theatrically released horror movies , especially the blair witch project ( the most overblown turkey of the decade ) , we needed a film like this .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: not only does it have a sense of history , but burton's skillful use of setting and mood make this an entertaining exercise in horror .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film's eerie landscapes and foggy towns , indeed , overshadow the actors and the plot as the most noteworthy aspect of the movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: johnny depp , a veteran tim burton actor who has appeared both in ed wood and edward scissorhands , plays ichabod crane , who has apparently changed occupations from irving's original story and is now an investigator .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: depp is adequate in his role .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: no more ; no less .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: equally adequate is christina ricci , who plays the love interest in the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she's a good witch too .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: how cute .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: one of the few weak parts of sleepy hollow is the wooden and cliched dialogue between the main characters .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the two actors , however , carry the movie well enough , but the supporting cast is what makes this movie shine .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: veteran actors such as jeffrey jones and michael gough ( who played the butler alfred in all four recent batman flicks ) are terrific as the aging townsfolk involved in the conspiracy which depp uncovers .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: while i do not wish to reveal crucial plot points , i can say that the storyline becomes quite confusing .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: you have to pay attention .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: andrew kevin walker wrote the screenplay .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he's the one who also wrote 8 mm and seven .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: walker is quickly becoming one of the premiere suspense writers in hollywood , and sleepy hollow certainly doesn't hurt his growing reputation .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as one might imagine from a gentleman like walker , sleepy hollow is quite graphic .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there's a lot of blood and a lot of beheadings .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this is definately not a flick to take the young kids to .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a lady in front of us took her two young sons to see it and spent about 25 - 30 minutes covering the youngest's eyes with her hand .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he was obviously upset by the movie's intense violence .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: if you're looking for a good scare , however , sleepy hollow is definately recommended .
docs.label: positive
